title: PATT Standard T&S Grant July 2012 for Dr D A Green
abstractText: The observations planned are Proposal 22-057 "Completing the wide-field 610 MHz polarisation study of the ELAIS N1 field".
impactText:
This "grant" was for an oberving trip to the GMRT.
Results from these observations have been shared with the wider community at conferences.
findingsText:
Observations of the polarised emission from faint,
distant radio sources. Helpful for understanding the level of polarisation of faint radio sources, which will be useful for planning the science that may be done with the SKA. Other
